title: Interpretation of a dream about walking on the street while seeing that I am walking on the street

preview.html: Contents: A dream of walking with someone I know in a dream, for a single woman, a married woman, a pregnant woman, with someone she loves, on a long road, behind someone, with a lover, with a stranger. Difficulty walking. Interpretation of a dream about walking. Seeing yourself walking on the road indicates the plans that the dreamer makes in his daily life to reach the great ambitions and future that he seeks to achieve in his daily life, and the road as he sees it is the road that leads him. Seeing yourself walking on a lighted road indicates that the goal is close to you, But if the road or street is dark, this means that the journey is still long to reach your goals. Seeing yourself walking on a certain path explains your lifestyle and the programs you follow. Seeing yourself walking on a narrow street indicates the anxiety you feel about an issue that concerns you. Seeing yourself walking Alone is an indication that your lifestyle is independent from others, and different from them and from your style. Seeing a bend in the road you follow is a sign of changes that will occur in your life. Seeing yourself walking on a black road or street is an indication of the difficulties you will face in your family or professional life depending on What you thinkSeeing yourself going down a dead end is a warning to you and a warning to the approach you are taking in life. Seeing yourself going in the opposite direction of the road means that you are challenging everyone and making decisions that go against what is prevailing. Seeing yourself going backwards indicates that you are thinking about the past. Seeing yourself crossing the road to the end It is a sign of a major change in your life. Seeing yourself walking on an unclear road is a sign of obstacles that you will face in your life. Walking on the street in a dream generally symbolizes the goals that the dreamer sets before him to achieve, and they are goals that he will often achieve. Whoever sees in his dream that he is walking on A road full of potholes, full of people and he does not have the necessary qualifications, this is a sign of problems and difficulties that prevent him from achieving his goals, but nevertheless he continues to do so. Walking in the direction he wants: Whoever dreams during his sleep that he is walking on the road, and that this road is dark and unjust, and there is no light on it, this is a sign that he will fall into many traps that others will set for him to prevent him. . From getting what he wants. Whoever dreams in his sleep that he is walking on a clean road free of potholes, and the road in front of him is free of defects. Whoever dreams that he is walking on a lighted road after darkness has fallen, this is a sign that he will receive help from someone close to him who will help him in Achieving one’s goals and achieving progress and development. The interpretation of a dream about walking on the road is that you are close to achieving your goal and ambition, and if the road you are taking is familiar to you, this means that you are close to reaching the goal. If it is dark, you will not benefit from this goal. If there is street lighting, you will You get pleasure and benefits. Dreaming that you are in a street usually embodies the trend or lifestyle you are walking in and also indicates things that are entering your life. If you are walking in a narrow alley, it shows anxiety about the situation you are in and you may feel

title: Interpretation of seeing a princess in a dream in different situations

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a princess in a dream in different situations. Princesses are characters that express a distinguished position in society, high status, and money. Seeing a princess in a dream is considered a positive and promising dream that indicates that the dreamer will gain an important position or that he will achieve long-awaited achievements in his real life. These interpretations and possibilities vary from person to person. In this article, we will learn together about the interpretation of seeing the princess in a dream in different situations. Interpretation of the dream of seeing the princess in a dream These visions are a big world with different symbols and meanings, and there are many people interested in their dreams and their interpretation, and today we present together the interpretation of the dream of the princess in a dream, as it is one of the things that It is commendable. Visions, as the princess in a dream indicates a high position and high status. This means that in the future he will obtain a prestigious position, a high and high status. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a prince in a dream for a single woman. A single woman always waits for God’s happy skin, always dreams of her dream boy and her hot knight and hopes that God will be happy and give her eternal happiness. She is at the peak of her life. Dream girl beautiful. Many: A prince in a dream symbolizes a good and spacious life. For an unmarried woman to feed her in a dream from a prince means that she will get married and obtain a great livelihood. A prince from another country symbolizes that she will marry a man from another city or work outside the country. The prince’s white clothes in a dream It symbolizes that the dreamer will marry a man of good morals whose conduct is not tainted by anything. Seeing an unmarried woman in a royal or princely palace means that she will obtain a prominent position in the coming period. A private conversation with the prince with good morals symbolizes a high and lofty position for the coming period. The prince in the dream indicates To eternal bliss and happiness. Giving a prince a gift to a girl in a dream indicates the good that she will receive and she will be completely satisfied with it. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a prince in a dream for a pregnant woman. A pregnant woman is waiting for God’s good news, as she combines feelings of fear and longing at the same time. Scientists interpret with goodness the vision of a prince and a princess in a pregnant woman’s dream, because it is considered a praiseworthy vision. A prince’s dream of a pregnant woman in a dream indicates that she will give birth to a handsome male son with a beautiful appearance and a beautiful face. Seeing a pregnant princess in a dream symbolizes the birth of a beautiful woman. Seeing The pregnant wife of a prince in a dream is interpreted as being given what she wants and desires. Interpretation of a dream about seeing princes in a dream for a manThe great scholar Al-Nabulsi, one of the eminent scholars of dream interpretation, interprets a dream about a prince as a broad, good and abundant diet. A prince in a bachelor’s dream indicates that he will get married soon The man’s dream indicates that he is a prince who will reach the highest ranks and the wealth that awaits him in the future. The removal of the prince from his position in the man’s dream means that he will face difficulties in the future. The prince who gives the dreamer food and money symbolizes that the dreamer will obtain a large and abundant livelihood. Dreams are part of The mind's thinking and imagination. It occurs during sleep because it is late

title: What is the interpretation of seeing the complete distribution of a wedding invitation in a dream?

preview.html: Interpretation of the dream of delivering a wedding invitation to the dreamer. It is one of the largest books by scholars in the field of jurisprudence and interpretation, and through the Trend website, which specializes in the sciences of dream interpretation and visions. The dream and interpretation of a dream about an invitation to a wedding in a dream in full, as well as the interpretation of an invitation for unmarried, married, and pregnant women, as well as for men.Interpretation of seeing a wedding invitation distributed in a dream by Ibn SirinThe great scholar Ibn Shirin indicated that the invitation to a wedding is generally a sign of news Pleasant and happy events. Seeing the distribution of an invitation to a full wedding in a dream means kindness and blessings, and the dreamer will receive a promotion at work and be promoted to his position. A friend’s invitation to marriage in a dream shows the full longing of this man for the girl and the speed of their meeting, God forbid. The dreamer seeing him handing out His wedding invitations to passers-by, while he is still there, indicate the inevitability of his marriage and achieving happiness. Why dream of a wedding invitation for an ordinary woman? Al-Nabulsi explained to us that the invitation to marriage in a dream, complete by a common woman, is evidence of the failure of the marriage with which she will go on in her life. The interpretation of the invitation card indicates for single people To the kindness, support and many blessings that you will receive. To see in a dream that you are handing out a wedding invitation to a common woman is one of the desired visions that indicate a successful and happy marriage. Why dream of handing out wedding invitations to a married woman? The interpretation of seeing a complete wedding invitation in a dream for a married woman is one of the visions that foretells With an imminent pregnancy for a woman. In addition, seeing a complete wedding invitation distributed to a married woman is a sign of kindness and support, as well as the success and success of her husband in business and trade. Seeing a dream of an entire wedding card being distributed to one of the boys is a sign of success and success in the lives of children And their achievement in the highest positions. Why dream of handing out wedding invitations to a pregnant woman? Interpretation of a dream about handing out an invitation to a wedding to a pregnant woman is an indication that she will leave childbirth without problems and difficulties. Receiving an invitation to marry from a pregnant woman in a dream is one of the dreams that indicate that she has given birth to a girl, and God knows what is in it. Uterus. Why dream of a wedding invitation? Inviting the dreamer to the wedding means that he will achieve many useful and wonderful things in his life. This vision also indicates that the dreamer will receive a lot of good news that will change his mood. This dream testifies to the fulfillment of goals and ambitions and the dreamer’s desire to succeed and achieve Desires.Dream of a wedding card symbol: Seeing a complete white wedding card in a dream means peace, comfort, and a life of stability and luxury. The interpretation of seeing a complete white wedding card in a dream shows kindness and salvation from the worries that find the dreamer in his life. If you have a dream and want to interpret it, leave it in the comment below A team of experts will answer you soon.

title: Learn about the interpretation of a horse in a dream for a girl from Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a horse in a dream for a girl: Among the interpretations that women who are passionate about dreams want to know, we have presented in this content many indications of seeing horses in a dream for single women from the most famous Arab translators such as Ibn Sirin, Ibn Shaheen and others, and so on. It is best to follow this interesting article: Interpretation of a horse in a dream for a girlInterpretation of a horse in a dream for a single girl is a sign of strength, determination, and will that characterize her in every detail of her life. Therefore, if a girl sees a horse in a dream, this shows her courage in difficult situations that require a tremendous amount of wisdom and logic. Seeing a horse in a dream is a sign of courage and bravery. If a Virgo notices that a horse is chasing her and then running away from it in the dream, this expresses her fear of confrontation and taking responsibility...the basic concepts in her personality to reach the best. One jurist says that seeing a horse in a girl’s dream is evidence of... Her wild personality that cannot be affected in any way unless there are some good things that will happen to her in any way. Recognizing impulsivity and the vicissitudes of life.Seeing the dreamer's inability to control the eruption of a horse during sleep may prove that she is attracted to desires, bad things and wrong actions in her life, but in case the dreamer is trying to control the eruption of the horse in the dream, it expresses her attempt to control. Herself and her various whims. Interpretation of a horse in a girl’s dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin says that an unmarried woman who sees a horse in a dream shows her serious personality in all the situations she is exposed to in life, and her dream symbolizes her marriage to a man who loves her and fears God within her. Ibn Sirin explains that Dreaming of buying a virgin horse during sleep indicates that she will reap many benefits from her work or family, and achieve her dreams that she has always desired. When an unmarried woman sees herself fighting a horse in a dream, this indicates that she is suffering from many internal conflicts, accompanied by a feeling of confusion and hesitation. And weakness, in addition to the appearance of things that do not benefit her at all. But she will be able to overcome them with all her might. If you still don't find what you're looking for? Log in from Google to a site about the secrets of dream interpretation and see everything that interests you. Interpretation of a horse in a girl’s dream by Ibn Shaheen Ibn Shaheen says that a girl seeing a horse in a dream is a sign of the dignity she enjoys, so when a girl finds herself in a dream riding a winged horse, this expresses She does good deeds in her world. Focus on balancing her good deeds and the fact that she sees Virgo herself riding a horse, but not adding anything to it suggests that there are some things that need more effort to complete. If Virgo finds that the horse’s hair is long in the dream, it symbolizes gaining power in a great position, even The Most Merciful is satisfied with her. When the dreamer sees her falling from the horse in a dream, this indicates an explosion in her life that will negatively affect her level.

title: Interpretation of a dream about spinach in a dream for a man and a woman

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about spinach by Ibn Sirin: Spinach in a dream is evidence of an illness from which the dreamer will recover. Seeing unfit spinach is an indication of the fears and problems that the dreamer is in. Spinach in a dream may indicate that the dreamer is busy with his professional life. Yellow spinach is a sign of unhappiness and pessimism. Seeing spinach is considered Fresh spinach is a sign of a lot of money. Eating cooked spinach is an indication of prosperity and happiness. Interpretation of a dream about spinach for a single woman. Seeing green spinach is a sign of good and happy news. Spinach in a girl’s dream is evidence that she will get married soon, especially if it is green. Cooking green spinach is evidence To get rid of worries and problems. If an unmarried girl sees spinach and is sick, this is a sign of recovery soon. Seeing fresh spinach is good. Eating spinach in a dream. For a girl, being single is evidence of marrying a young man of good character. Interpretation of a dream about spinach for a married woman: Eating spinach, green vegetables, in a dream, it is a sign of Pregnancy in the near future. If a married woman sees that she is cooking spinach, this is a sign of consolation. Seeing a married woman preparing spinach, this is a sign of existing marital happiness. Yellow spinach is a sign of problems and fears. Interpretation of a dream about spinach for a pregnant woman. Eating green spinach is evidence that a date is near. Entitlement. Eating spoiled spinach in a dream is a sign of a difficult birth full of fatigue. Interpretation of a dream about spinach according to Nabulsi. Spinach is a sign of wealth and obtaining a lot of money. Seeing spinach that is not fresh is an indication of an unfavorable vision. Cooking spinach in a dream is evidence of the groom. Spinach is evidence New to illness and troubles. Seeing spinach in a dream can be a sign that you have children. If anyone sees a dream about harvesting spinach is evidence of the dreamer’s involvement in life. Yellow spinach is a sign of unhappiness that the dreamer feels. Spinach in general in a dream is evidence of sustenance and abundance. Money. Interpretation of a dream about spinach for a man. If one sees spinach in a dream, it means that you will have a child. Seeing a young, unmarried spinach in a dream is a sign of blessing and livelihood, and God will grant him a good wife. Spinach is evidence of getting rid of worries and sadness in a man’s dream. To see yourself Cutting spinach means a lot of money and we wish you success. Add the dream you would like to interpret in a comment below the article and we will answer it and explain it.

title: The meaning of seeing a talisman in a dream

preview.html: The meaning of seeing a rock in a dream, and the vision indicates freedom from worries and sorrows, the presence of psychological problems that will end soon, freedom from obsessions and fears, the legitimate fortress of Muslims... The fortress is a Qur’anic collection. Verses and Muslims pray over and over again for protection from the eyes of magic, diseases, and harm that may expose him or threaten his family, loved ones, or relatives around him. Ruqyah In a dream through My Look magazine, the ruqyah has different meanings depending on the condition of the dreamer, and the researcher and translator Ibn Sirin explained that the ruqyah expressed safety, contentment, and distance. Absence of anxiety and sadness. Then it can mean that a person suffers from a lot of psychological pain, problems that he seeks to get rid of and a desire to achieve complete peace, in addition to that he shows a constant feeling of anxiety and obsessive-compulsive disorder, which attracted the attention of followers, and this anxiety is transmitted in the dream, the meaning of seeing ruqyah. In a dream, the ruqyah is a sign of protection and protection from Satan and the fulfillment of dreams and desires. The talisman in a dream is according to Ibn Sirin. According to Ibn Sirin, seeing a ruqyah in a dream can indicate the desire for money and the desire for knowledge. Sometimes it may indicate his recovery from the disease and his freedom from the epidemic that has afflicted the body. With it, and sometimes it indicates that he works in adverse conditions and bad conditions. It also indicates longevity and the elimination of problems and obstacles, which may mean that the person enjoys good relationships and religious conditions and longs for the elimination of psychological problems. See also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing or hearing Surat Al-Balad in Interpretation of ruqyah in a dream for a single woman: Seeing a single person wanting to perform ruqyah in a dream may indicate that the girl suffers from anxiety, stress, and obsessive-compulsive disorder, which makes her need ruqyah to feel comfortable and calm, and she may express her desire to get rid of magic. And deception and granting all wishes. See also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing or hearing Surat Al-Fajr in a dream. Interpretation of a ruqyah in a dream for someone. The dream of seeing another person saying the legitimate ruqyah in a dream may mean that God Almighty has exempted him from the worries, problems and obstacles that he faces. It may indicate that false language and obstacles Which was living in front of the dreamer and that he suffered the cause of the psychological obstacle. title: Interpretation of a dream about eggplant in Al-Osaimi’s dream

preview.html: Dreaming of eggplant in a dream Al-Asamit Interpretation of dreams Eggplant in a dream It indicates goodness and a lot of food if it is white. White eggplant in a dream also indicates good deeds and observance of religious obligations. As for dreaming of black eggplant, it symbolizes worries, sadness, and problems. If one sees in a dream the safety of growing eggplant Black, this indicates the good qualities of the dreamer. Interpretation of a dream about eggplant in a woman’s dreamInterpretation of a dream about eggplant In an unmarried girl’s dream, this is evidence of the approaching marriage. A dream about roasted eggplant can be a sign of failure in life and it could be a sign of breaking up an engagement. Interpretation of a dream about eggplant in A dream for a married woman: A dream about eating white eggplant in a married woman’s dream is a sign of happy circumstances that will happen to her in the near future. Eating cooked eggplant in a dream indicates good news and the return of expatriates. Eating grilled eggplant indicates marital differences. Interpretation of a dream about eggplant for a pregnant woman. A dream indicates Eggplant to a pregnant woman’s dream with ease of childbirth and the health of the fetus. Eating fried eggplant indicates the birth of a male child. But if he sees that he is eating roasted eggplant in a dream, this indicates undesirable events that he experiences and suffers from during childbirth. Interpretation of a dream about eggplant in a man’s dreamIf a person sees What in a dream is that he buys eggplant? This indicates grace and abundance of money. Buying fresh eggplant indicates prosperity and good offspring. Fried eggplant indicates the prestigious position that the fortuneteller occupies in his field of work. Eating fried eggplant also indicates happiness in the dreamer’s home. A dream about seeing eggplant prematurely indicates To the marital problems that you will encounter. Eating white eggplant in a dream indicates happiness and great joy. Add the dream that you would like to interpret by referring to your marital status in a comment below the article and we will respond to it and clarify it.

title: Interpretation of dreams about my aunt cursing me in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about my aunt cursing me in a dream. If you ask about the meanings of cursing, we will learn about the interpretation of a dream about my aunt cursing me in a dream according to the interpretations of scholars and translators. Interpretation of dreams about my aunt cursing me in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about my aunt cursing me in a dream. We did not find specific interpretations to see this except that seeing an insult from someone in a dream. It can express the harm that befalls the dreamer, and God knows the unseen. When you see insults in a dream, it can be a sign of humiliation of the one who insulted him, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. If the dreamer sees himself cursed in a dream, it may be a sign of disrespect, and God has all knowledge. Interpretation of a dream My aunt is laughing in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about my aunt laughing in a dream. Seeing my aunt happy may mean good news, and God knows the unseen. If the dreamer sees his aunt happy in a dream, this may be evidence of the good news he hears, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. If a married woman sees a happy aunt, it may express her happiness. And God knows best. When you see a happy, unmarried aunt in a dream, it can be a sign of goodness and happiness, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about my aunt giving birth in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about my aunt who gave up vomiting in a dream. Vomiting can lead to things worthy of praise, and God knows best. Where if the dreamer sees a person vomiting in a dream He has the right to repent, and God knows the unseen. If the dreamer sees himself vomiting, this may be evidence of the return of the trust to its owner, and God knows the unseen. When you see vomiting, it may be a sign of recovery, and God knows best. Interpretation of dreams about my aunt’s engagement to her son in a dream. Interpretation of dreams about my aunt’s engagement to her son in a dream. A dream. We did not find any specific interpretations of seeing this. However, seeing a woman engaged to a son in a dream could be a sign that I will be free from trouble, God willing. Also, seeing admonition and joy can show goodness and comfort, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. If an unmarried girl sees engagement And sadness in a dream can express sadness, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of dreams about my aunt who expelled me in a dream. Interpretation of dreams about expelling my aunt in a dream. Expulsion from relatives can indicate injustice from the family, and God knows the unseen. So if the dreamer sees expulsion from his relatives’ house, it may lead him to injustice, and God knows the unseen. The highest and most knowledgeableIf a young man sees in a dream that his relatives have been expelled, this may be evidence of the lack of kinship, and God knows the unseen. If a married woman sees that she has been expelled from her family in a dream, this may be a sign of the removal of the uterus, and God knows best. Perhaps seeing a naked woman expresses the misery in which she lives, and God knows the unseen. In the event that a single young man sees a naked woman whom he knows, this may lead to the unhappiness and fatigue that she feels, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. If she sees a girl naked, this may be a sign of A woman’s misery, and God knows the unseen. title: Interpretation of a dream about a lover by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about someone you loveLove or an emotional relationship is a set of beautiful and sincere feelings that every girl and boy dreams of, so what about the interpretation of a dream about a lover in a dream? Is seeing it a good omen for the dreamer, or does it portend bad luck in other cases? In this article, we will point out the different cases in which the sleeper may see someone he loves, such as hugging, kissing, or hitting the lover, as well as the death of the lover, and we will put different interpretations for each case. And the signs of great jurists and scholars, such as Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream about a beloved. Most scholars and jurists, such as Imam al-Sadiq and Ibn Sirin, promise to see a beloved in a dream, and we find praiseworthy indications such as: The interpretation of a dream about a beloved indicates the arrival of goodness and the fulfillment of desires. Seeing a beloved in a dream is a sign of a close marriage, happiness, and a feeling of joy. If the dreamer sees her lover holding her hand in a dream, this indicates a feeling of comfort, security and peace in her life. Seeing a sick person whom he loves and is dear to in a dream being taken to a far away place may foretell his imminent death. Interpretation of a dream about a lover by Ibn Sirin. The interpretation of seeing a lover in a dream mentioned the sign. Muhammad Ibn Sirin has a group of different connotations, the most important of which are: Ibn Sirin interprets the dream of a lover in a dream as good news about the dreamer reaching his goal and achieving his effort and goal. If the dreamer sees that he is offering food to someone he loves in a dream, this is a sign of piety and justice in this world. Whoever sees in his dream that someone he loves gives him money, his status will rise and his status will rise among family, acquaintances, and friends at work. Ibn Sirin says that seeing a lover in a dream indicates the spiritual relationship between the two parties and the affection and love between them. Interpretation of a dream about a lover for a single woman. Scholars differed in the interpretation of a dream about a lover. For an unmarried woman, depending on the state of the vision, it is not surprising that we find different meanings: If a single woman sees in a dream the person she loves and is sad, this may indicate that she is facing problems that expose her to psychological pressure. Ibn Shaheen says that a girl sees her lover cheating on her in a dream with a girl Another is a sign of his bad behavior, and a warning for her to stay away from him. It is said that seeing the dreamer meeting her lover in a dream in the morning means that she is on the right path and far from doubt. Whereas if the dreamer sees that she met her lover secretly in a dark place in the dream, this may indicate Indicating that she will be tempted and commit sins. Seeing an ex-lover and talking to him in a single woman’s dream. Seeing an ex-lover in one dream and talking to him shows that she is still thinking about him and wants to restore their relationship again. Seeing an ex-boyfriend in a girl’s dream indicates longing for past memories with him. If she sees The dreamer has an ex-lover standing far away from her in a dream and she cannot reach him. This is a metaphorical expression of the obstacles and problems she faces in her love life. Interpretation of a dream about a lover with a married woman. Seeing an old lover in a married woman’s dream may indicate many problems and marital disputes in her life. If the wife sees She meets her ex-lover in a dream

title: Interpretation of a dream about greeting a woman’s hand by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a handshake for a woman: Seeing a handshake in a dream is generally considered a common vision that is frequently repeated in the world of dreams, but when the dreamer sees it, many questions arise in his mind about its interpretation and what are the consequences associated with the vision. In particular, if the greeting is for women, depending on the social status of the pioneer, therefore, in the following lines, we will present the opinions of jurists and commentators on the interpretation of this dream. Interpretation of a dream about greeting the hand for a woman. Specialists and leading experts in the science of dreams pointed out the goodness of this vision and the connotations it carries. On the dreamer, wishing him a happy life and joy soon. The subconscious mind includes desires and desires, which include marriage and starting a family, in order to feel peace of mind and stability. Peace in a woman is a good sign that indicates the opening of the doors to work and living for the dreamer and his proximity to the goals and desires that he aspires to achieve by joining a dream job or entering into a business partnership. A successful dream that will bring him many profits and huge material gains that will change his life for the better and grant him great happiness and prosperity, and God knows best. If the dreamer is miserable in his life and lives in many crises and sorrows, then he must preach after shaking hands with a woman he knows in waking life; Because it is a good sign of his good condition, and his improvement. Living conditions and getting rid of all his worries and worries soon. Interpretation of a dream about greeting a woman by the hand according to Ibn Sirin. The scholar Ibn Sirin predicted that shaking hands in a dream is nothing but an expression of love and tenderness between people who exchange greetings in a dream, and seeing the dreamer happy and successful in her life. The more the dreamer shows happiness And joy when he greets a woman in his dream, this is confirmation that he enjoys a happy life full of successes and happy news, and that he is very close to his dreams and desires that he was searching for. a lot. In order to reach.One of the signs of peace in incest is that the family or family is stable without problems and disputes and proves the existence of common relationships that could be a professional partnership or a family origin, which greatly strengthens the relationship between them. New friends will never regret meeting them, because they will represent the best help and support for him. Interpretation of a dream about peace by hand in a single womanIf an unmarried woman sees that she is giving birth to another girl she is familiar with in reality, and then she feels comfortable and calm, this is a good omen for her good condition and the fulfillment of her desires and dreams in the near future It was said that the dream is a sure sign that the girl is inviting someone she loves to attend her wedding for the sake of what is close to a good young man of high standing who will work to bring comfort and happiness to her. A girl who shakes hands with an unknown woman, and she looks sad and desperate, is an unfavorable sign for She will face some difficulties and obstacles in the coming period. She may fail in the current academic stage, or she will lose her job. As for shaking hands with the dead, it proves her good behavior and good morals, in addition to her constant care to get closer to God Almighty and voluntarily provide for good. Interpretation of a dream about peace
